alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 07 at 3:14AM MST until December 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches in the Gros Ventre mountains and Teton Pass. Total snow accumulations of 20 to 30 inches in the Teton Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
